[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/ericmjl/polcart.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/ericmjl/polcart)

# polcart
A small utility for converting between polar and cartesian units

## Installation
Install via `pip`:

```bash
$ pip install polcart
```

Install via `conda`:

```bash
$ conda install -c ericmjl polcart
```
